an2.52:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggala loke uppajjamana uppajjanti bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an2.52:1.3: Tathagato ca araham sammasambuddho, raja ca cakkavatti.
an2.52:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggala loke uppajjamana uppajjanti bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya, bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
an2.53:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggala loke uppajjamana uppajjanti acchariyamanussa.
an2.53:1.3: Tathagato ca araham sammasambuddho, raja ca cakkavatti.
an2.53:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggala loke uppajjamana uppajjanti acchariyamanussa”ti.
an2.54:1.1: “Dvinnam, bhikkhave, puggalanam kalakiriya bahuno janassa anutappa hoti.
an2.54:1.3: Tathagatassa ca arahato sammasambuddhassa, ranno ca cakkavattissa.
an2.54:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam puggalanam kalakiriya bahuno janassa anutappa hoti”ti.
an2.55:1.3: Tathagato ca araham sammasambuddho, raja ca cakkavatti.
an2.56:1.3: Tathagato ca araham sammasambuddho, paccekabuddho ca.
an2.57:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniya phalantiya na santasanti”ti.
an2.58:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniya phalantiya na santasanti”ti.
an2.59:1.3: Bhikkhu ca khinasavo, siho ca migaraja.
an2.59:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniya phalantiya na santasanti”ti.
an2.60:1.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamana kimpurisa manusim vacam na bhasanti.
an2.60:1.3: Ma ca musa bhanimha, ma ca param abhutena abbhacikkhimhati.
an2.60:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamana kimpurisa manusim vacam na bhasanti”ti.
an2.61:1.1: “Dvinnam dhammanam, bhikkhave, atitto appativano matugamo kalam karoti.
an2.61:1.4: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, dvinnam dhammanam atitto appativano matugamo kalam karoti”ti.
an2.62:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an2.62:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an2.62:2.1: “Kathanca, bhikkhave, asantasannivaso hoti, kathanca asanto sannivasanti?
an2.62:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, therassa bhikkhuno evam hoti:
an2.62:2.3: ‘theropi mam na vadeyya, majjhimopi mam na vadeyya, navopi mam na vadeyya;
an2.62:2.4: therampaham na vadeyyam, majjhimampaham na vadeyyam, navampaham na vadeyyam.
an2.62:2.5: Thero cepi mam vadeyya ahitanukampi mam vadeyya no hitanukampi, noti nam vadeyyam vihetheyyam passampissa nappatikareyyam.
an2.62:2.6: Majjhimo cepi mam vadeyya …pe… navo cepi mam vadeyya, ahitanukampi mam vadeyya no hitanukampi, noti nam vadeyyam vihetheyyam passampissa nappatikareyyam’.
an2.62:2.7: Majjhimassapi bhikkhuno evam hoti …pe… navassapi bhikkhuno evam hoti:
an2.62:2.8: ‘theropi mam na vadeyya, majjhimopi mam na vadeyya, navopi mam na vadeyya;
an2.62:2.9: therampaham na vadeyyam, majjhimampaham na vadeyyam, navampaham na vadeyyam.
an2.62:2.10: Thero cepi mam vadeyya ahitanukampi mam vadeyya no hitanukampi noti nam vadeyyam vihetheyyam passampissa nappatikareyyam.
an2.62:2.11: Majjhimo cepi mam vadeyya … navo cepi mam vadeyya ahitanukampi mam vadeyya no hitanukampi, noti nam vadeyyam vihetheyyam passampissa nappatikareyyam’.
an2.62:2.12: Evam kho, bhikkhave, asantasannivaso hoti, evanca asanto sannivasanti.

an2.62:3.9: therampaham vadeyyam, majjhimampaham vadeyyam, navampaham vadeyyam.

an2.62:3.12: Evam kho, bhikkhave, santasannivaso hoti, evanca santo sannivasanti”ti.
an2.63:1.1: “Yasmim, bhikkhave, adhikarane ubhato vacisamsaro ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattam avupasantam hoti, tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham:
an2.63:1.2: ‘dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca na phasum viharissanti’.
an2.63:2.1: Yasminca kho, bhikkhave, adhikarane ubhato vacisamsaro ditthipalaso cetaso aghato appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattam suvupasantam hoti, tasmetam, bhikkhave, adhikarane patikankham:
an2.63:2.2: ‘na dighattaya kharattaya valattaya samvattissati, bhikkhu ca phasum viharissanti’”ti.
